item.description:
We'll gather in the clubhouse at Janice's condo in South Windsor for a potluck dinner and board games night. Bring a contribution for dinner (appetizer, entree, or beverage) and your favorite game for the group! It's Janice's birthday, so dessert is also being provided.

This event is jointly listed with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group and alreay has more than 59 people signed up! They won't all be tall, but come on out and party with them!

Games:

We have already:
* Pictionary
* Picture Picture
* Worst Case Scenario
* Trivial Pursuit
* Scene It
* Jenga (well a knockoff version)

We'd like to see someone bring:
* Bolderdash
* Cranium

Bring any other game you might think 4 - 6 people at least could play at the same time. Team games of 2 -3 would be great too. Note this is an indoor game night in a clubhouse with a kitchen area. We are not doing horseshoes or lawn darts!

Food:

Supplied already:
* Paper and glass products

Please plan to bring to share:
* Finger food
* Snacks
* Small entree (plan to feed 5 people!)
* Drinks

Birthday:
You don't have to bring a present. Janice just appreciates seeing and sharing fun with her friends!

This is at a hall at a condo complex in South Windsor. The address will be sent to those who respond "Yes" or "Maybe" about a few days before the event. We would appreciate donations of any amount (maybe $2?) to help offset the cost of the hall rental. Donations can be made at the event. We all hope you can attend and enjoy a warm evening with great people.

Happy Holidays!!!
item.name: Potluck dinner and games night
